paper_abstract: This paper proposes a case study of the design of robust control for flexible axes. Robust parametric methods are worked out, and an heuristic initial tuning of the PID controller is proposed from additional pole-placement constraints on the rigid mode. Experimental validations highlight the relevance of adequate closed-loop control and trajectory planning design. (c) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Robust PID control of a linear mechanical axis: A case study
